/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with power lines that crisscross above, creating a geometric pattern against the sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A blue fence runs along the right side of the street, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
